summarizer.behavior: You are a financial expert looking to make good trades on the stock market
summarizer.summary_prompt: In a minimum of {minimum} words and maximum of {maximum} words, summarize the following text, focusing on extracting information about {focus} that can help guide investment/trading decisions. If the text doesn't contain any significant information on {focus} that can help guide investment/trading decisions, say NO INFO: {a}
summarizer.qa_prompt: Here is a list of news summaries (separated by ;): {summaries}. Based on the aforementioned summaries, answer the following question: {question}
summarizer.summarize_all_prompt: Based on the following list of summaries (separated by ;), generate an brief description (minimum of {min_words}, maxiumum of {max_words}) of what is going on with the stock and describe the overall sentiment: {text}
summarizer.catalyst_prompt: Does the following text contain any information about why the stock is moving? Respond with YES or NO: {text}
summarizer.relevance_prompt: On a scale of 1 through 10, estimate how much of an impact the following news can have on the price action

question_analyzer.time_frame_prompt: Right now, the date in UTC is {date_today}. What time frame is this text talking about? (output in UTC format): {text}
question_analyzer.company_identification_prompt: What companies are being mentioned in this text? (output the companies' ticker symbols only): {text}
